General.Name: Hoegh Autoliners ASA
General.Description: Höegh Autoliners ASA engages in the deep sea transportation of roll-on roll-off (RoRo) cargoes worldwide. The company offers transportation services for agricultural, automotive, boats, breakbulk, construction and mining equipment, machineries, power equipment, railcars and tramways, trucks, buses, equipment handling, and trailers. It also provides shortsea, terminal, and supply chain management services. Höegh Autoliners ASA was founded in 1927 and is based in Oslo, Norway.
